Element.Name: UBL version ID
Element.Description: The UBLversion identifier

Element.Name: Specification identification
Element.Description: An identification of the specification containing the total set of rules regarding semantic content, cardinalities and business rules to which the data contained in the instance document conforms.

Element.Name: Business process type identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the business process context in which the transaction appears. It enables the buyer to process the document in an appropriate way.

Element.Name: Qualification Reception Confirmation identifier
Element.Description: Identifier of a document, must be a UUID

Element.Name: Reference number
Element.Description: An identifier that is specified by the buyer and used as a reference number for all documents in the procurement process. It is also known as procurement project identifier, procurement reference number or contract folder identifier.

Element.Name: Document issue date
Element.Description: Date when the referred document was issued.

Element.Name: Document issue time
Element.Description: Time when the document was issued.The issue time must have granularity of seconds, and include time zone information

Element.Name: Document reception date
Element.Description: Date when the referred qualification document was received.

Element.Name: Document reception time
Element.Description: The time at which the referenced qualification document was received by the sender of the response.The registered time must have granularity of seconds, and include time zone information

Element.Name: Received document reference
Element.Description: The qualification reception confirmation contains the reference to the qualification document sent by the economic operator and a REM-Evidence, a receipt that acknowledges the time of arrival of a qualifiction document.

Element.Name: Document identifier
Element.Description: The identifier of the received qualification document or the identifier of the REM-Evidence. Must be the same UUID of the received qualification document.

Element.Name: Document type code
Element.Description: A code specifying the type of the document. The code used to reference a qualification is 916 (Related Document). The code used to reference the REM-Evidence regarding the time of arrival of a tender is 13 (Post receipt).

Attribute.Name: List identifier for document type code

Element.Name: Document digest
Element.Description: Digest of the document. Must be a SHA-256 value.

Element.Name: Document digest method code
Element.Description: Code that indicates the algorithm used to calculate the hash.

Element.Name: Issuing party electronic address identifier
Element.Description: Electronic address of the party, which issued the qualification document or REM-Evidence.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier for electronic address identifier

Element.Name: Contracting body
Element.Description: The contracting authority or contracting entity who is buying supplies, services or public works using a tendering procedure as described in the applicable directive (Directives 2014/24/EU, 2014/25/EU).

Element.Name: Contracting body electronic address identifier
Element.Description: Electronic address of the contracting body.

Element.Name: Contracting body identifier
Element.Description: The national identifier of a contracting body as it is legally registered (e.g. VAT identification, such as KBO)

Element.Name: Contracting body name
Element.Description: The name of the contracting body as it is registered.

Element.Name: Economic operator
Element.Description: Any natural or legal person or public entity or group of such persons and/or entities, including any temporary association of undertakings, which offers the execution of works and/or a work, the supply of products or the provision of services on the market. MUST be the Main Qualifying Party who send the qualification document.

Element.Name: Economic operator electronic address identifier
Element.Description: Electronic address of the economic operator being the main qualifying party.

Element.Name: Economic operator identifier
Element.Description: An identifier that identifies the economic operator, such as a legal registration identifier.

Element.Name: Economic operator name
Element.Description: The name of the economic operator.
